publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3398 Malcolm Chisholm: Mental Health (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Mental Health (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Dr Richard Simpson*
